Package adris.altoclef.trackers

Class SimpleChunkTracker

java.lang.Object
adris.altoclef.trackers.SimpleChunkTracker
public class SimpleChunkTracker extends Object
Keeps track of currently loaded chunks. That's it.

    • scanChunk

      public boolean scanChunk(net.minecraft.util.math.ChunkPos chunk, Predicate<net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos> onBlockStop)
      Loops through every block in a chunk if it is loaded. If the chunk isn't loaded, it doesn't scan anything.
      Parameters:
      chunk - The chunk pos to scan
      onBlockStop - Run for every block until it returns true, where it stops scanning.
      Returns:
      whether `onBlockStop` returned true at any point.
